1.title: Kount Kraucula's Picture Book: What's Inside Your Gut Shmut
1.plot: Meetup.com/IHeartBadNovies presents-KKKRS/S.6/Ep.1 - Popular professional Indie Actor/ Cartoonist/Filmmaker/Magazine Publisher and Picture-Book Illustrator, Tony 'Tex' Watt returns and is showcased about the debut of his and his benevolent alter ego (author) Kount Kracula's picture book: "What's Inside Your Gut, Shmut?: : A Tragic First Tale of the World's Last Dumbosaurus!"..also, included this the related book trailer and the first trailer, for the upcoming B-Movie: "Claudio Must Die!". Plus another episode of Kraculette's Kartoon Corner. c/o TonyWatt.com.

2.title: John Migliore's Creature from Cannibal Creek, Jackie Zbuska's Charlton Comics Movie Fundraiser, Tex's new vintage John Byrne Fantastic Four comic book & Vivita's new Toronto Apothecary Studio segment
2.plot: Vivita Apothecary Soap and Stuff Shoppe presents-KKKRS/S.6/Ep.2 - Popular professional Indie Actor/ Cartoonist/Filmmaker/Magazine Publisher and Picture-Book Illustrator, Tony 'Tex' Watt returns to host, alongside Kount Kracula (with new co-hosts: Em and Caz).also, included this the related book trailer and the first trailer, for John Migliore's "Creature from Cannibal Creek" (featuring "Creeky" the love-able titular monster character) B-Movie;,Director Jackie Zbuska's Charlton Comics Movie Fundraiser, Tex's new vintage John Byrne Fantastic Four comic-book and Sponsor ...

1.title: Kount Kracula's Twisted Sinema-book
1.plot: This is the wacky far-out first episode, of the campy, gothic, Toronto, Canada-based book/graphic novel/movie /pop-culture ephemera review showcase t.v. series; featuring the whacked-out, stoner-vampire horror-host: Kount Kracula [and guest reviewer; Sophia The Superpussy!].

2.title: Dumpster Baby
2.plot: Zombie horror host Johnny Ghoulash (aka actor/underground cartoonist/filmmaker: John Migliore) reviews the disturbing Troma Entertainment B-movie, 'Dumpster Baby' by directors James Bickert and Randy Hill.

3.title: Grim
3.plot: Zombie horror host Johnny Ghoulash (aka actor/underground cartoonist/filmmaker: John Migliore) reviews the brutal Troma Entertainment B-movie, 'Grim' by director, Adrian Santiago.

1.title: Return to Nuke 'Em High: Vol. 1 - Movie Review
1.plot: This episode features the main zombie horror host (and nemesis of former vampire-junkie horror-host, Kount Kracula): Johnny Ghoulash (aka actor/underground cartoonist/filmmaker: John Migliore) with the deviant German vampire horror co-host: Nigel (N.) Oscar Feratu III; along with the frisky, tattooed-goth horror hostess: Trixie Treats (with a debut cameo appearances by Trixie's worldly, street-wise hipster puppet: Lou Garou and the new jerky, bespectacled, nerd-boy: Mr. Geek), reviewing the (soon-to-be) neo-classic Troma Entertainment B-movie: 'Return to Nuke 'Em High...

2.title: The Creightonville Terror - Movie Review
2.plot: This episode features the main zombie horror host (and nemesis of former vampire-junkie horror-host, Kount Kracula): Johnny Ghoulash (aka actor/underground cartoonist/filmmaker: John Migliore) with the deviant, blood-sausage loving German vampire horror co-host: Nigel (N.) Oscar Feratu III; along with the frisky, tattooed-goth horror hostess: Trixie Treats (with a debut cameo appearances by Trixie's friend the perky, grape-haired, dim-witted : Molly Mugwort - The Wacky Witch), reviewing, The Creightonville Terror - The cinematic love letter to drive-in and grind-house...

3.title: Troma Actors: Behind the Screams Interviews
3.plot: In this episode of K.K.R.S.; featuring John Migliore as your horrific host 'Johnny Ghoulash' & Andre Guantanamo as the bald, sexually-deviant, blood-sausage lovin' vampire: 'Nigel (N.) Oscar Feratu'; interviews Troma Entertainment's (Lloyd Kaufman directed)"Return to Nuke 'Em High Volume 1" cast & crew members: Brenda Rickert, Mick O'Keefe, T.J. Smith, Jim Sheppard & Ron Mackay. Also introduced is cast member: Amanda Pollock as Skeleton Woman. Exec. Producers, Tony 'Tex' Watt & Vivita, also appear in brief cameos. The mega-talented Horror Host: Johnny Ghoulash also ...

1.title: The Black Devil Doll Movie & Cartoonist: John Migliore
1.plot: This review showcases the underground cartoonist/filmmaker/animator/ actor: John Migliore, comic-book creator/artist of "The Grad" "Dinky on the Road" and Jonathan Lewis's cult film: Black Devil Doll (2007) is reviewed.

2.title: Crawler Movie & Silverblood Comic Series by Filmmaker/Cartoonist: SV Bell
2.plot: With most of the monster cast/crew on Halloween Vacation..Tex Watt acts as a 'heavy breathing' cameraman (well, with the sexy female co-hostesses, whadd'ya expect, Chum?), as the intrepid Coffey Brown (Kimberlee McCalla) and the super-human sexpot Video Girl (Darcy Ann Turner) reviews the Crawler movie and Silverblood comic series, by Quebec-based Filmmaker/Cartoonist: SV Bell.

3.title: Sybil Danning, Battle Beyond the Stars, L.A. Bounty, Danning's Ruger Comic and Horror-Rama 2015
3.plot: Kount Kracula, Duchess Kraculette and Johnny Ghoulash invade Horror-Rama and brings you a most excellent interview with movie queen Sybil Danning. Actor/Filmmaker Mitch Markowitz and author (Monster) Matt Patterson also make appearances.

1.title: Kount Kracula's Review Showcase-Jesus Christ Vampire Hunter, Nude Pin-up Caitie Rage, We Love Monsters's Jim Ordolis & Tex Watt
1.plot: Toronto's VivitaSpa.com presents-KKKRS/S.4/Ep.1- WE LOVE MONSTERS magazine's Publisher: Jim Ordolis and Writer/Cartoonist/Filmmaker: Tex Watt (& Nude Pin-up Subject: Caitie Rage ) are profiled + 'Jesus Christ Vampire Hunter'DVD review.

2.title: Kount Kracula's Review Showcase- Joe Pickett and Nick Prueher's Found Footage Festival Events and DVD Collection
2.plot: Toronto's VivitaSpa.com presents-KKKRS/S.4/Ep.2- Vintage VHS curators Joe Pickett and Nick Prueher's Found Footage Festival live screening events and DVD Series, reviewed by Glenn the Suspect Video Clerk & Tex Watt.

3.title: Thea Munster and Adam Invader's Toronto Zombie Walk Events and Filmmaker: Sophia the Cat's Actress Search, for TWI's "Scream Spermula Scream" Movie
3.plot: Thea Munster and Adam Invader's Toronto Zombie Walk Events and Filmmaker: Sophia the Cat's Actress Search, for TWI's "Scream Spermula Scream" Movie (as well as 'Night of the Living Dead' Halloween Season TWI Artspace Toronto screening and 'George Romero' (pv) tribute, in the expanded episode with 2nd unit director: Jeff 'The New Guy' Roth).

2.title: IDW's 'Woodworks' Hardcover Wally Wood Tribute & Justin McConnell's 'Skull World' Movie
2.plot: Kount Kracula's Review Showcase (S.5-Ep#2): - Kount Kracula makes one of his rare review appearances (with his new "The Kount's Toilet Library Treasures" segment), with IDW's 'Woodwork: Wallace Wood, 1927-1981' Hardcover (Master Comicbook creator ) Wally Wood tribute, from the show producer's own collection and Justin McConnell's 'Skull World' Movie-Doc ( Following two years in the life of Toronto , Canada's eccentric Greg Sommer, aka the infamous: Skull Man; as he develops the Canadian chapter of 'Box Wars', an international underground movement of cardboard-based ...

3.title: Tony 'Tex Watt's Actor, Cartoonist, Filmmaker, Magazine Publisher's Stripper Girls Gone Crazy Magazine Debut
3.plot: Toronto's VivitaSpa.com presents-KKKRS/S.5/Ep.3 - Popular professional Actor/ Cartoonist/Filmmaker/Magazine Publisher, Tony 'Tex' Watt returns and is Interviewed (at TWI Studios), by guest co-Hostess/Actress : Alexa Morgan (& on the the co-Stars of Frankenpimp's Revenge). Co-Host (Exec Producer/Director) about the debut of his 'Stripper Girls Gone Crazy' Nudie Magagazine [Entertinment Magazine for Nerds and Men at Heart!]. info about iBleedIndie.com b-movie pay-site creator: Johnny Macabre...also, creator Also Tex Watt discusses aspects of his colorful career.
